article_title: GOP-led House frequently voted to weaken EPA, roll back financial rules
article_text: If the record of the current Republican-led House is a guide, the Environmental Protection Agency, Affordable Care Act and Dodd-Frank financial-regulation law will be frequently under attack should the GOP win enough Senate seats on Nov. 4 to gain full control in the new 114th Congress next year.

article_metadata.title: GOP-led House frequently voted to weaken EPA, roll back financial rules | Bellingham Herald
